html:
1.7.23  11:37 pm   I always imagined that you are practicing to have a panel show at comic-con where people ask you smart-ass questions and you respond in kind. My question is, what range of time does it generally take to respond to each question here?

      about 1 second unless it stirs up some deep conflict in my soul

1.7.23  11:24 pm   whats on the news

      drama, mystery, cliff hangers,

1.7.23  10:41 pm   how do i know if i've been thinking too much

      if you asked that, you are thinking too much, but it's ok

1.7.23  7:27 pm   just thought id ask this because ive been wondering for a while. was it an intentional humorous choice to follow up a song called "the ending" with "where i've been", or was it just a humorous coincidence?

      neither

1.7.23  7:16 pm   i cant play any instruments i make music with midi do u know how to get it to sound nicee

      no one knows how to get music to sound nice. it's magic. it's like making people laugh or saying nice things to people. no one knows exactly how to do that either, but it still happens somehow, because it's magic, and so can you

1.7.23  6:57 pm   How would you solve world hunger?

      make more food

1.7.23  4:29 pm   What's a good name for a duck

      none. if a duck has a name it means it's probably been misunderstood somewhere along the line

1.7.23  3:18 pm   opinion on bread?

      unbelievable. unthinkable. unlikely

1.7.23  2:55 pm   hI how hard is it to Start a sENTENCE with a captial letter thx in adVance

      it's pretty easy but sometimes it makes you sound fake

1.7.23  12:22 pm   is it legal to make laws?

      that depends on how much power you have

1.7.23  12:12 pm   Can a dog fly?

      most of them can't

1.7.23  9:26 am   Ever played a marimba?

      yes

1.7.23  9:10 am   how do i spell popcorn?

      i'm not sure

1.7.23  9:05 am   2013 was 10 years ago. Let that sink in.

      i was already aware of that

1.7.23  8:28 am   do you have opinions on everything you know

      no

1.7.23  6:36 am   Why do I feel like everyone hates me?

     because you are good at worrying about things

     Even my closest friends and family, I can't unconvince myself that they secretly despise me.

Do you deal with this? I hope not.

     sometimes yes

     Do you have any advice for dealing with it?

     think about some of the people who you actually like, and really don't hate. imagine that they might be worried you hate them

1.7.23  4:50 am   since you'll be about 17 days late with the next video according to the three week schedule, will the next two videos after that be released early to compensate, or are you basically over the schedule for now?

      each one will be targeted to be early by the same amount that i'm late in total. unless that target date is in the past, in which case the target date should be a maximum of about 4 days after the previous release

1.7.23  4:40 am   What's a food that most people really like that you cannot stand?

      cherry flavored

1.7.23  3:14 am   Holy shit I haven't practiced in forever and now I sound like shit and I'm kind of scared

      it's gonna be fine

1.7.23  2:01 am   would you consider using the jaw harp in another song?

     don't know what that is, but sure

      might you consider the use of harmonica, recorder, or accordion?

     sure

     thanks bill, we love you!!

1.7.23  12:32 am   serious question here, how and why did you start making the surreal and dream like animations to fit in with your music? take im scared for an example, the background animation almost makes no sense or does in some way and how the funky upbeat music almost gives the animation a type of feeling that you are in a dream or something. i kinda expect a real answer thanks bill ❤️

      you'd have to be more specific, because the parts of it that i can remember have just a plain white or plain black background

1.6.23  10:36 pm   how can i take on the world?

      have you tried standing on a chair

1.6.23  9:21 pm   what's your chess elo

      must be default

1.6.23  8:19 pm   Seeing the corporate world firsthand made me feel so small and nonvaluable. Is this the world im going to have to deal with forever?

      you'll at least discover other sides of it that you're more comfortable with. you also may discover that you are more valuable than you thought

1.6.23  7:51 pm   does a set of all sets contain itself?

      i guess that depends if it's recursively updating. if so, be prepared for some glitches or a crash

1.6.23  7:30 pm   How to not take things for granted

      toss them in your hand lightly. size them up

1.6.23  6:31 pm   how to not be stupid? my retardation is getting the better at me and is impeding my success

      start writing a book about how smart you are. trust me, this will work

1.6.23  6:26 pm   how do i become like you mr wurtz?

      i dunno but if you're like me, then who's gonna be like you

1.6.23  4:43 pm   how does music move people

      it poses most of the standard questions that go along with free will. what's more, it poses those questions not just on a mental level but also an emotional level, and everything in between

1.6.23  4:07 pm   If you were given the opportunity to have an infinite supply of any food, which food would you have an infinite supply of?

      water

1.6.23  2:29 pm   "More Than a Dream" is literally the best thing I've ever heard in my life how do you do this?

      i don't know but you've just sent an overwhelming amount of friendlyness on here

1.6.23  1:27 pm   Why don't we just make a simulated rearranged version of everything? With the technology we have today, we can simulate any experience,

     not quite yet

     without actually going through the trouble of actually experiencing it.

1.6.23  1:23 pm   Do you plan on making a song that is inspired by a single, mundane word?

      surely i've done that, with more to come

1.6.23  1:11 pm   is it cheating to hack?

     in some games

     is it hacking to cheat?

     a little bit

     is it hacking to hack?

      let me perform some calculations

1.6.23  12:01 pm   What's the longest it has taken you to finish a song (without music video) ? I've been working on and off on a song of mine since September 2022, and I'm still not finished :(

      'more than a dream' hovered in the music production process for many months, but that's because i took some detours to program some useful features and also got caught up programming some features that didn't turn out to be so useful

1.6.23  11:37 am   as a new yorker, new canaan resonates with me as how I feel about all the wealthy suburban towns surrounding the city and the strangely peaceful and nostalgic atmosphere they have, do you feel that same way

      they put a lot of money into keeping it clean, but also most of those towns are probably pretty old. especially the town centers

1.6.23  11:32 am   What is your opinion on space?

      love it

1.6.23  11:26 am   What the heck am I doing

      paving the way, for a better tomorrow

1.6.23  9:32 am   hey do you ever get mad?

      only in my dreams

1.6.23  8:32 am   why is the word fuck bad

      it's too good

1.6.23  6:32 am   do you have photographic memory

      not exactly

1.6.23  5:16 am   how do you fly a plane

      i'm not sure

1.6.23  4:00 am   where do you get the ideas for your non-music animations?

      any where

1.6.23  1:09 am   if you are scared "of the world out there", and the world out there has music out there, do you get scared when you are writing music

      yes i do

1.6.23  1:06 am   Where does your infinite wisdom stem from?

      the trash

1.5.23  11:42 pm   how do u cope with feeling like everything is an illusion

      start doing some physical movements and exercises

1.5.23  9:37 pm   What would be a cool artist name?

      your name (and no i don't mean "your name." don't even think about pretending i meant that)

1.5.23  8:50 pm   did napoleon achieve immortality 

      i doubt it

1.5.23  8:04 pm   How are you doing right now?

      pretty good

1.5.23  7:02 pm   What percentage of your body is comprised of ramen noodles?

      0
